Lively Kernel

Mailing list

Join our mailing list at http://lists.hpi.uni-potsdam.de/listinfo/lively-kernel to find out what people want and what they are working on. If you produce a bug fix or enhancement, post it on this mailing list to share it and to submit it for inclusion in future releases.

Archived postings are available from http://lists.hpi.uni-potsdam.de/archive/lively-kernel.
